name: For Your Information
description:
For Your Information is a team multiplayer game, placed in corporation offices. Among other employees, Players need to blend in work to avoid another players.
Multiple interactable objects on the map. Every document is readable. Constant paranoia that someone is watching us - included!

Spy

The team of spies must survive on the map and find 3 random documents containing the password components and then find a randomly locked locker to win the game. In the event of an interrogation, Spy must use his cover to convince the Guard that he is an employee. The cover appears on the screen at the beginning of the game for 5 seconds.

Guard

The team of guards must find spies on the map, observing the surroundings and employees to find those who differ. Under suspicion, they can interact with every NPC and player and start an interrogation after which they can judge whether it is an NPC or a player. They can only select NPCs 3 times before they are kicked out of the game.

Main Features:

Two teams - Spies and Guards.
First person view.
Very simple character model to make it difficult to recognize the player.
Interactable environment.
Randomly generated main gameplay points like locked locker, documents to find, password, cover for spies etc.
Hiding under desk to disappear in dangerous situations.
Interrogation based on basic dialog with randomly choosen answers for NPC.
Spy during interrogation gets 4 very similar options to his cover as an answer.
Guard can check answers with employee list.
Lobby with Chat.
